name: Sopomino - solo
description:
Sopomino - solo Hello everyone !

This is the first ever video game I upload. It's only a copy of of a famous game but I'm very proud of it. The game you can play now is only the "local" version,  I'm currently working on a multiplayer version of it. kinda like *T work*  99 or jstris.

I'm also thinking about making some game mode. like, make 30 lines faster possible, increase speed by the number of lines you made. Stuff like that.

Do not hesitate to give me some feed back and join my discord to learn more about this project !

If you want to support me, the best way is to follow my itch.io account and join my socials (links bellow ❤️ ) or buying me a café thanks to this link 

Thanks, Have fun !!

Abdou Sopo twitter - instagram - twitch
